articles.description:
👋🏻 ATTENTION HACKERS
@blockchainbeard is hosting office hours in the @MinaProtocol discord rn for anyone looking for support.
Join link - https://discord.gg/MinaProtocol
Channel - #zkapps-hangout
If you're already a D_D Member, we'll be hosting another immediately after in our server… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1674090238870790144

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): 🚨 Announcing our latest Hackathon with @MinaProtocol !!
- Kick-off workshop with @blockchainbeard on Monday @ 5pm UTC
- $10,000 in Prizes (USDC, Mina, CODE)
- Learn to build zkApps
- Open to all 
RSVP for the launch workshop and full hackathon details below ⬇️ https://t.co/sVFsTfMzXq
